cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.RO, cs.IR. 

This paper is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category as it deals with image processing and improving the spatial resolution of images. Additionally, the paper mentions post-capture refocusing and aperture control, which are common computer vision tasks. 

The paper may also belong to the graphics (cs.GR) sub-category as it deals with capturing and manipulating light rays in space. 

The multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category is also a possibility as the paper deals with capturing and processing visual information. 

The robotics (cs.RO) sub-category is a possibility as the paper mentions the use of an XY stage for optimal performance, which is commonly used in robotics. 

Finally, the information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category is a possibility as the paper deals with capturing and processing visual information, which can be used for image retrieval tasks.
